com.heaton.bot.catbot
Class RecognizeCountry

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.heaton.bot.catbot.Recognize
        |
        +--com.heaton.bot.catbot.RecognizeCountry
public class RecognizeCountry
extends Recognize

This recognizer is called to handle a page that contains a large list of countries. The country that was specified in the CatBot class will be located and used.

Author:
Jeff Heaton
